name: OasisUser
description: User Database and Creation for The-Oasis. Just testing thirdweb. The-Oasis is my Unity-based project using Web3.

eventDecorators.name: ContractURIUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: UserCreated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: UserDeleted
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

functionDecorators.name: _createUser
functionDecorators.description: Create new user and store in mapping for specified account.

functionDecorators.name: _deleteUser
functionDecorators.description: Delete registered user by resetting mapping values for specified account.

functionDecorators.name: createUser
functionDecorators.description: Create new user and store in mapping.

functionDecorators.name: deleteUser
functionDecorators.description: Delete registered user by resetting mapping values.

functionDecorators.name: getUser
functionDecorators.description: Returns registered user information from stored mapping/struct for specified account.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setContractURI
functionDecorators.description: Lets a contract admin set the URI for contract-level metadata. Caller should be authorized to setup contractURI, e.g. contract admin. See {_canSetContractURI}. Emits {ContractURIUpdated Event}.

parameterDecorators.name: _uri
parameterDecorators.description: keccak256 hash of the role. e.g. keccak256("TRANSFER_ROLE").

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
